author: ekoneil
msg: Fix the WSM build.  This change starts to use Maven2 to download WSM dependencies / install into the local M2 repo and uses Ant for build / test.
Yes, there needs to be a README.txt file attached here; that's coming.
To build WSM, the workflow is now:
just coerce Maven to download dependencies -- surely there's a better way...
clean / build sources and install the resulting JARs into the local Maven repository
runs the usual junit / server tests
I've also added templated .pom files for each WSM JAR file that are completed with the WSM version number while installing the JARs into the Maven repository.
